thread.section_title: The Piccadilly London West End - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: First class service
thread.title_full: First class service - Review of The Piccadilly London West End, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: rayw00dc0ck
title: First class service
text: Reception on arrival was a smile and a glass of Prosecco; great first impression. The room was well appointed and maintained. Several nice and thoughtful little touches to make us feel welcome. Had a very comfortable nights sleep. Staff were friendly and helpful. Location cant be beaten for a show break; will book again.
